summary: A command‑line utility that loads a music spectrogram diffusion model’s components (continuous encoder, notes encoder, decoder) from checkpoint files, assembles them into a HuggingFace Diffusers pipeline (including a DDPMScheduler and optional ONNX runtime support), and saves the resulting pipeline in the standard Diffusers format for downstream inference.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to package and distribute music‑spectrogram diffusion models as ready‑to‑use Diffusers pipelines, simplifying deployment, sharing, and integration of AI‑generated music generation capabilities into applications.
